headlines.description: Alexandre Lacazette scored his first goal of the season in his first start under Unai Emery, handing Arsenal a 3-2 victory against Cardiff City.

video.headline: Mustafi gets Arsenal's first against Cardiff

headlines.shortLinkText: Lacazette helps Arsenal hold off Cardiff late

headlines.description: A pair of goals from Romelu Lukaku was enough for Manchester United to beat Burnley 2-0 a Turf Moor on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rashford sent off in Man United win vs. Burnley

headlines.description: Troy Deeney and Craig Cathcart scored from set pieces in the second half as Watford came from behind to defeat Tottenham Hotspur at Vicarage Road.
headlines.shortLinkText: Deeney, Cathcart strike as Watford beat Spurs
